channel.title: Awards on Cr0w's Place
channel.description: Recent content in Awards on Cr0w's Place

item.title: Scholarship - TROOPERS 18
item.description: I received a scholarship covering the ticket to the TROOPERS 2018 information security conference in Heidelberg. Cr0w’s Place Vlog of Attendance BlackHat, TROOPERS and more! TROOPERS18 and a crazy journey!

item.title: Scholarship - Black Hat Europe 2017
item.description: I received a scholarship covering the Academic Pass to Black Hat Europe 2017 in London. Cr0w’s Place Vlog of Attendance BlackHat, TROOPERS and more! BlackHat Europe 2017 – The Wrap Up

item.title: Scholarship - Black Hat Asia 2017
item.description: I received a scholarship covering the Academic Pass to Black Hat Asia 2016 in Singapore. My road to BlackHat Asia 2017 and some updates!

item.title: Scholarship - TROOPERS 17
item.description: I received a scholarship covering the ticket to the TROOPERS 2017 information security conference in Heidelberg. Cr0w’s Place Vlog of Attendance My Road to TROOPERS Scholarship! – Part 1 My Road to TROOPERS Scholarship – Part 2 TROOPERS 17 – The Wrap Up

item.title: Scholarship - Black Hat Europe 2016
item.description: I received a scholarship covering the Academic Pass to Black Hat Europe 2016 in London. Cr0w’s Place Vlog of Attendance My road to BlackHat Europe so far (or how to get your scholarship)! My road to BlackHat Europe so far – Part 2 (Acceptance email) BlackHat Europe 2016 – Epilogue
